testCase.name: NavBar after the login is successful NavBar should have search, home, admin dashboard, profile and a settings button in the hamburger menu button
NavBar after global admin login is successful NavBar should not have any profile button for global admin
NavBar after global admin login is successful NavBar should not have any home button for global admin as that re-directs to the profile page for now
NavBar after global admin login is successful The hamburger menu has a Admin Dashboard button and clicking it takes the user to the Dashboard page.
NavBar after the login is successful NavBar should not have login button anymore and have website logo button instead
NavBar after the login is successful Website's logo button that is on the NavBar on the click should redirects the user to the logged in user's news feed
NavBar after the login is successful Global search bar exists on the top of the NavBar
NavBar after the login is successful A hamburger menu option exists for quick navigation around website in the of the NavBar
NavBar after the login is successful The hamburger menu has a Home button and clicking it takes the user to the Home Feed.
NavBar after the login is successful The hamburger menu has a Map button and clicking it takes the user to the Map page.
NavBar after the login is successful The hamburger menu has a Profile button and clicking it takes the user to the Profile page.
NavBar after the login is successful The hamburger menu has a Search button and clicking it takes the user to the Search page.
NavBar after the login is successful The hamburger menu has a Settings button and clicking it takes the user to the Settings page.
NavBar after the login is successful The hamburger menu displays the user's name John Smith.
NavBar after the login is successful The hamburger menu states that the user is Signed In.
Check user profile page There should be an edit profile button on the profile page
Check user profile page There Should be an Add activity button to the Add activity page
Check user profile page should display the Logged in user details in the panel on profile page
Check user profile page should display the Logged in user passport country details in the panel on the right of the page
Check user profile page should display a Full Map button.

Check user profile page should take the user to the full map page with the correct coordinates when the Full Map button is clicked. + Passport country pane is not displayed when user does not have any countries selected.
button appears on the bottom left of the profile page if admin should have admin promotion button
Signup page display should display the Sign up title

Signup page display should have password2 input box
Signup page display should show an error if first name is empty
Signup page display should show an error if last name is empty
Signup page display should show an error if email is empty
Signup page display should show an error if bio is too long
Signup page display should show an error if dob is not within #common-sense
profile created should call createUserProfile and router push to move to profile page
password error handling should show an error if password is shorter than 8 characters
password error handling should show an error if password1 and password2 do not match
password error handling should show an error if number is not included in the password
password error handling should show an error if there is no lowercase letters in the password
password error handling should show an error if there is no uppercase letters in the password
submission error should appear when appropriate should show submission error when the user names contains numbers

NavBar before login or sign up The hamburger menu has a Sign Up button and clicking it takes the user to the Sign Up page.
